desc: Training cup recommended by experts for learning to drink from an open cup. Perfect baby first cup & toddler weaning cup, carefully designed for little hands & mouths, to learn healthy sipping & drink from a rim. Baby cups promoting natural drinking & oral health. Sippy cup not sucky cup. Also for cup-feeding infants.

layout.text: For baby's first sips through to weaning and beyond. (Also suitable for cup-feeding infants).
